title: versus event
body: Can i do both sides of the event? or do i have to just stick with one?

replies.body: You can definitely choose your side each day!  Once you pick your side, though, that will be the choice for remainder of the day.  Missions should refresh around 11am pacific, which should offer you a quest to choose your side.  Let me know if that clears things up!
I believe you can do 1 side per day, otherwise yes. But it's best to do 1 side, unless you want dem icons.
